name: Galleon (itch) (Microeye)
description:
YOOHOO wannabe pirate!

Come on board to discover the secrets and the history of the Queen Anne's Revenge! The mighty Galleon of the greatest pirate captain that sailed across the 7 seas: Blackbeard!

Have fun exploring the ship gaining medals to keep track of your progress!

You will be guided by Blackbeard himself... maybe not in the form you imagine him!

Used Tools Resources

Parrot: https://www.cgtrader.com/3d-models/animals/bird/scarlet-macaw-animated

SkyBox: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-series-fr...

Sea: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/standard-assets-for...

Sounds: https://www.zapsplat.com/ & https://mixkit.co/

Font: https://www.dafont.com/jenna-sue.font

Meet the TEAM

-Margherita Del Balio: Modeler, Illustrator, UV's

-Enrico Gobbo: Texture Painter, Unity Programmer Consultant

-Constantin Codrut Ionescu: Modeler, UV's

-Chiara Mele: Unity Programmer

-Gabriele Minischetti: Unity Programmer

-Stefano Rizzi: Unity Programmer 

-Riccarco Curci: Voice Actor


This project was made for the VR course at the Politecnico of Turin 2020/2021

Dialogues are in Italian.
